Hoboken.Jack's Stir Brew Coffee: Jack’s Stir Brew Coffee is a coffeehouse with 6 locations in New York City as well as 2 in Hamptons Bay, NY. The first location in the historic Greenwich Village on W. 10th Street was opened by owner Jack Mazzola in 2003. It was the first Organic, Fair Trade, Shade-Grown coffeeshop in the city. The coffee is prepared using the patented Stir Brew method.
